docs.lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin newspaper is apologizing for a columnist who connected Minnesota Vikings star Adrian Peterson's child abuse case to beatings suffered by slaves.

headline.main: Paper Apologizes for Column Tying Peterson Case to Slavery

docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank is preparing for a potential capital increase of about 8 billion euros ($8.5 billion) as it seeks to strengthen its balance sheet and free up funds for strategic investments after years of restructuring.

docs.lead_paragraph: An evangelist preacher is calling for a boycott of the upcoming Walt Disney film "Beauty and the Beast" because it features a gay character, saying that the company is trying to promote an LGBT agenda to children.

docs.lead_paragraph: Long-running hearings for whether a giant telescope can be built atop a Hawaii mountain have wrapped up. But it will be a while before a decision is made on a project that has prompted intense protests by those who believe it will desecrate sacred land.

headline.print_headline: After 44 Days, Hearings End for Giant Telescope in Hawaii
headline.main: After 44 Days, Hearings End for Giant Telescope in Hawaii

docs.lead_paragraph: Ride services company Uber Technologies Inc [UBER.UL] for years has used a secret tool to avoid authorities in markets where its service faced resistance by law enforcement or was banned, the company confirmed on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Uber Used Secret Tool to Evade Authorities
headline.main: Uber Used Secret Tool to Evade Authorities

docs.lead_paragraph: Georgia, responding to an intervention from a European court, on Friday suspended a ruling from a domestic court that had placed the country's biggest independent TV station under the control of a close ally of the government.

headline.print_headline: Georgia Suspends Ownership Change for Broadcaster After Euro Court Ruling
headline.main: Georgia Suspends Ownership Change for Broadcaster After Euro Court Ruling

docs.lead_paragraph: An Alabama drive-in theater won't show a new re-telling of the classic fairy tale "Beauty and the Beast" because one of its characters is portrayed as homosexual.
